meanings.sent1: The comsats help us talk to people far away.
meanings.sent2: The comsats in space allow us to send messages across the world.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if the comsats ever get tired of floating in space all day.
meanings.sent4: The comsats are like silent messengers in the sky, connecting us effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: Looking up at the comsats above, I am reminded of our ability to reach beyond the clouds.

meanings.definition: The name of a university in Pakistan.
meanings.sent1: She studies at COMSATS University and enjoys her classes.
meanings.sent2: COMSATS is known for its quality education and research programs.
meanings.sent3: I dreamt last night that I was attending COMSATS University in Pakistan.
meanings.sent4: The knowledge gained at COMSATS is a beacon of hope for many students.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the halls of COMSATS, I felt inspired by the pursuit of knowledge.
